The term "datastream" is used here in a generic fashion, normal indices are also More precisely, you'll be able to identify:
* Tier core-health metrics.
* Consumption breakdown, in terms of storage and operations.

_Note: costs are calculated based on values set in the configuration and the costs **per tier per 1 GB RAM per hour.**_
